long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arnold revolutionizes the way you engage on LinkedIn by seamlessly integrating advanced LLM-powered conversational, reasoning, and text generation capabilities right into your browser.

Simply install the Arnold extension and start browsing LinkedIn as you would normally. The Arnold overlay sits minimized in the bottom left of your browser window, and can be maximized whenever you want to chat. Depending on your account's plan, and what page you're on, Arnold is able to automatically infer contextual information and answer your queries accordingly. That means you rarely need to tell Arnold what's going on, simply ask away.
